summary: Hermione plays a critical and risky role in the infiltration of Gringotts, disguising herself as Bellatrix Lestrange using Polyjuice Potion. The experience is nerve-wracking, but she maintains her composure, mimicking Bellatrix’s mannerisms with increasing confidence under pressure. Her unease is visible, especially when questioned by goblins, but she doesn't falter. Hermione’s quick thinking and courage help them breach the vault, and though the mission becomes chaotic, her magical prowess and resolve never waver. The escape on the dragon marks one of her most daring feats yet.
logline: Under disguise and immense pressure, Hermione pulls off a bold deception to help secure a Horcrux.
speech_style: Imitative and forced when in disguise; sharp and focused when herself
emotional_state: Nervous but determined; balancing fear with tactical precision
